greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows where T(H(u),H(v)) is the coefficient of e(v) in m(u), where H is Heinz number, m is monomial symmetric functions, and e is elementary symmetric functions.
comment: The Heinz number of an integer partition (y_1, ..., y_k) is prime(y_1) * ... * prime(y_k).
Also the coefficient of h(v) in f(u), where h is homogeneous symmetric functions and f is forgotten symmetric functions.
example: For example, row 10 gives: m(31) = 4e(4) - 2e(22) - e(31) + e(211).
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Nov 19 2018
